website_summaries.verdict: A button-sized stroller that's ideal for toddlers and cute enough for all ages.
pros: Stroller rolls easily on carpet and stays put when stationary
While designed for 18-inch dolls, it is capable of enduring an accidental attempt to sit in by your real-life doll
Capable of keeping kiddos active for hours
cons: Would be even better if this stroller's parts were fastened by hook-and-loop straps

customer_reviews.title: Great Doll Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great! My almost 2 year old has had this for months and still plays with it every day. It still looks new and she is rough! Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toddler daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: 3 year old daughter is out of her mind with happiness. She saw something similar on the playground. Another little girl who had it let her borrow it and we had trouble getting her to give it back. So we bought her one and it wasn't just a transient interest. She still loves it months later.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for niece.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best stroller for ANY LITTLE GIRL that loves strolling her babies! I bought as a gift and it far exceeds my expectation. One flaw is that the front part where the babies sit keeps sliding off, but can fix with a needle and thread to keep in place. Hopefully they can just add a button or something to keep in place.
customer_reviews.author: LilWaif

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my daughter's 2nd birthday. She loves it, she can throw her baby or a stuffed animal in it and runs around the house. It came folded up, so there was no need to put anything together. The little basket in the bottom is cute and she likes to put her phone or a diaper in there. It's lightweight and the perfect height for her.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Grand daughters love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my oldest grand daughter who is just over 2yrs old and she loves it so much. The stroller has a little storage pouch on the bottom like a real stroller does and like a real mommy she keeps all her babys stuff in that. Only negative side is my 13 month old granddaughter is always trying to take it for her baby even though she has a stroller of her own. Both my girls love it and it definitely is holding up against two toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the PERFECT little stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is the PERFECT little stroller. It's a great height for my two year old, who loves pushing babies on walks (or in the store, when we bring it with us.) It's cute and sturdy. The basket underneath the stroller is an adorable addition you don't see on most strollers. My daughter loves collecting things on our walks (rocks, leaves, etc) and loves putting her toy cat in the basket while pushing her baby in the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: SJDecker

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Has held up to a 2 year old for months now. Has been tripped on at night an then angrily kicked by adults. Survives tantrums of it being tossed across the room. We take it more places then we want. So far a few scuffs but no cracked wheels no dangerous failures in metal or plastic. Great value for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: dmiggitymac

customer_reviews.title: 1 Year Old Loves Pushing Her Dolls In It!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is perfect for small and medium sized dolls.The stroller appears to be sturdy. My 1 and half year old niece loves pushing her "babies" around. The stroller can be folded up easily for storing away or traveling purposes. I love that by pushing the stroller, my niece is further developing her gross motor skills.
customer_reviews.author: GermanShepherdMomTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching
customer_reviews.text: This doll stroller is really cute for my 2.5 year old daughter, but even with light play the fabric ripped in less than a month. It ripped in such a way that it cannot be salvaged. My daughter still enjoys it but it won't stick around for too long if she can't put her dolls in it. Save your money and get something that will last.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sturdy and very functional
customer_reviews.text: This toy stroller is put together better than I expected. It has been played with a lot and is still in great shape. My child enjoys putting other toys in the bottom sling while the doll rides in the seat. I'm very glad I chose this one - a perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: AHH

customer_reviews.title: Not even complete
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely terrible. The seat bottom does not attach to the frame at all. What does that mean? No baby doll can sit in it. They fall right through. Craziest thing I've ever seen. We returned it. Twice. Literally twice. They were both that way.
customer_reviews.author: A Hall

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material but wheels work great
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart in less than a week. The cloth ripped off the left seat bar and now the other side is starting to shred as well. Not very strong material and if your child plays anywhere near as rough as my daughter i would look for a different toy stroller. She does still play with it and loves it. The wheels work well as she races her baby dolls as fast as she can around the kitchen table and they have held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Great size for 2.5 year old
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this thing. Easy to put together and super cute. She loves the basket below to carry around all her treasures.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shea

customer_reviews.title: Very Small Stroller
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is remarkably small. The top of the handle sits just below my 3 year-old’s waist. It also is suitable for smaller dolls- 8” is more appropriate than 12”. It’s also the quality of dollar store or carnival products. You get what you pay for, and I don’t feel too bad because this is the stroller my child selected and she is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Public Name

customer_reviews.title: sturdier then our first stroller and soo very much fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this stroller, she is a big active girl at 22 months and it is holding up really well to her play
customer_reviews.author: Julie Renee Doering

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old daughter loves this. Good size for her. Little basket at bottom good for her extra dolly. Only problem is one of the wheels is on crooked, like the plastic but my daughter didn't even notice and it doesnt mess with the movement
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller arrived quickly and looks just like the picture. The little basket at the bottom and the hood canopy are very cute features. This was for my granddaughter who is almost two, and she loves it. I think it will still work for her when she's three, at least. Seems fairly sturdy and I'm pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Frederici

customer_reviews.title: Fun Stroller
customer_reviews.text: 3 Year old granddaughter LOVES this stroller. She loves the basket so that she can put baby bottles or extra stuff animals in.. She lowers the canopy so that the baby doesn't get the sun in its eyes. Also, we get to be placed on the canopy when we FaceTime and also get to go for a walk.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie J

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Great little doll stroller for the price. I love that it has a little basket and a nice sunshade. The only thing is that the front wheels do not swivel. Which is totally fine because my 2 year old can easily use the stroller
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height for kids 4 and under
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 yr old. She loves it. It’s the perfect size for her to push around. It’s a small stroller so I will recommend for ages 4 and under since the stroller is not very tall. Easy to set up and fold down.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: it is very well made and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for a 2 yr old and she LOVES it!!! it is very well made and easy to use. Only complaint is that the fabric slips onto the base where the doll sits and it keeps falling off so we had to alter a little with a few stitches to tighten to keep it on. otherwise colors are vibrant, stroller functional and child very happy : )
customer_reviews.author: EMoore

customer_reviews.title: Nieces loved them
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for our twin nieces for Christmas. They love them and fortunately not a loud toy to drive their parents crazy.
customer_reviews.author: awraynor

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry I bought this for my 2 yr old granddaughter. She loved the babydoll- but this stroller was more flimsy than I expected I saw one at Costco that was much better but saw it to late
customer_reviews.author: Karen Clark

customer_reviews.title: Toddler loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 18 month old daughter. She absolutely loves putting her babies in the stroller and walking around with it.
customer_reviews.author: Boxer Lover

customer_reviews.title: If your child is like 3 or older than go with another stroller
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely dissappointed in this product. Much smaller than it looks. This stroller is made for maybe a child just leading to walk. If your child is tall no it's extremely too small. If your child is like 3 or older than go with another stroller. This stroller is much smaller than advertised! Quality is about as good as the $10 one they sell at Walmart. So disappointed in this purchased but scared to return it and get another before Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it!!! My twins are 3 and they push each other around in it!!!
customer_reviews.author: lisa barnett

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My 2 granddaughters love the stroller. They play with it all the time. Very lightweight. Folds down for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mcilwain

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for our next door neighbor's daughter. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: This came in a cheap plastic bag for packaging. It didn't last long and the seat kept coming off the front because it just slides on and off, no velcro to hold in place. The seam ended up ripping on the side of the seat and we threw away after that.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 days
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my toddler as a Christmas gift. It’s been used for a plush doll for only two days, and it’s already broken. I feel awful. So much for that gift... Time to replace it with a better quality one.
customer_reviews.author: SweetPotatoFries

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty pink polka dots. 💞 nice toy
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter will love this Eid gift. It’s very cute and the perfect size for a toddler who loves her dolls.
customer_reviews.author: MaryamHajar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old daughter just loves this stroller. My husband and I think it is very well made, and the best part is there is ZERO assembly required! Just unfold it like a real umbrella stroller and you're all set!
customer_reviews.author: Zatanna Winters

customer_reviews.title: Just like a real stroller - only for dolls
customer_reviews.text: This is holding up nicely. Do not try and pinch a few dollars to get a cheaper one with the 2 pink handles (that one broke in so many places). This handle is firm and strolls nicely. My 1 and a half year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my two year old!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute & my daughter loves to put pretty much anything in it to stroll around. Love that it has a little part in the back to put stuff too. She's on the taller side and after looking for a doll stroller, some others said they were too short. This one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Stein

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect match for my granddaughters baby doll and she loves it. It is build sturdy and I think it will last a long time. I recommend it to others who are looking for a cute addition for their little girls.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Girl

customer_reviews.title: Cute Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Good price and cute little stroller. Has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Cute and 18 mos and up love it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grand daughter as an Easter gift this year,, and she could not stop strolling it around. She changes the dolls out and plays inside and outside. Easy to put together. So far it had held up the 3 months little girl use. She liked it so well I purchased another one for her to play with at my home.
customer_reviews.author: Aline L. Lemoine

customer_reviews.title: Cute stroller for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it. It’s just the right height for her. The pink and white pokka dots are just precious
customer_reviews.author: Carla m Bennett

customer_reviews.title: GREAT 2 YEAR OLD GIFT
customer_reviews.text: MY GREAT GRAND DAUGHTER LOVED THIS LITTLE STROLLER. SHE IS 2 YEARS OLD AND SHE LIKE TO TAKE HER BABY FOR A STROLL. LIGHT WEIGHT, DURABLE TO WITH STAND 3 BROTHERS JERKING IT AROUND.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: great stroller for every day use
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this stroller!!! Perfect size for her...very tall 3 year old. She loves the polka dots and realistic seatbelt/safety straps. Great for stuffed animals and baby dolls. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B3thy

customer_reviews.title: I like how it is easy to fold and transport
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this little stroller serves its purpose and my daughter loves it, whenever she plays with her dolls. I like how it is easy to fold and transport, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca1978

customer_reviews.title: Very Small
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small toy and my 6 yo daughter is to big to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Henshaw

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Toddler loves this. We even use the basket below as another baby seat.
customer_reviews.author: KR1983

customer_reviews.title: Better sized for 2yrs olds
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and sturdy, but too small/short for my 4 yr old. Perfect for 1-2 yr olds
customer_reviews.author: tiffany I

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute stroller!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is perfect for my almost 2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Balta M.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I bought this for my 18 month old granddaughter and she just love pushing It all over the house with her 'baby' inside. Very sturdy and so much fun for her. Great price point as well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura E. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: VERY SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but very small. Made for a 2-3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Both of my twins LOVE this stroller. They take it everywhere with them. It goes outside too and is very very durable. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Adieu

customer_reviews.title: Not steady I'm afraid we are gonna end up w a head injury
customer_reviews.text: It's what I ordered and cute but not sturdy at all for a 11month old trying to learn to walk
customer_reviews.author: Princess Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Small but perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece for Christmas. She’s turning three and of average height for her age. She loved it! It fit her perfectly. She immediately put her baby doll inside of it and pushed it around the rest of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one about three yrs ago and another one last year for my granddaughters. I’m going to purchase another one soon for a gift. Well made, very cute and my girls love them
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Cute for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. It’s on the smaller side though. My 3 year old is on the taller side. She won’t be able to use it much longer. But all in all it’s cute and she loves pushing her babies around.
customer_reviews.author: MB0127

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality. Didn't last much. All the seams ripped apart even though my little girl plays gently.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Small for a 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: A little small for a tall 4 year but she still loves it
customer_reviews.author: Craig S. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Goddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Really nice! My goddaughter loved it! She pushed her doll around then sat in it herself and wanted to be pushed! It was sturdy enough to hold her!
customer_reviews.author: T. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Our old doll carriage did not hold up after using outside one time. This has been used on a regular basis by my granddaughter and she is not careful with it. She likes the little pouch under the seat to put her purse in while she is pretending.
customer_reviews.author: MTbugle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old's dolls and she loves pushing them around in it. She has 2 older brothers who have been rough with it, sat on it, etc and it's still in great shape!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Haseleu

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter that is one year old bought a doll to push in it to but she thinks it is for her to ride in. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Pam  Barnes

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height for my 1.5 year old. She loves it! Better than the other doll strollers I have seen by far
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made stroller
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is not very well made. If the front tires are pushed against something, the stroller folds up. There is no latch to keep the stroller from doing it. This is not good for a toddler pushing it. Made very flimsy. I would have rather paid more money for a better made stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Gambatese

customer_reviews.title: Its sturdy too.
customer_reviews.text: My 20 month old daughter loves this stroller!! It took a few seconds to stand it up. Its sturdy too.
customer_reviews.author: cmgj

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & no parts to put together!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my three year old granddaughter and she is going to love it. Very well built and the best part is you do not have to put it together!
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a two year old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for a two year old. It's a pretty pink and was a nice size for a little girl. It's easy to open for use and fold up when you need to put it away. And as an added bonus, no assembly.
customer_reviews.author: CLIFFORD HAZELTINE

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: My 2yo daughter adores this stroller. Fits blankies in the underneath basket and fits all her ‘babies’

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: This was part of my 2 year old grand-daughter’s birthday gift and she loves putting a baby in it.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my granddaughters
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old and 18 mo old granddaughters loved their strollers! The dragged and pushed them around all day. Easy to food up for transport!

customer_reviews.title: My great niece thought it was the greatest thing
customer_reviews.text: My great niece thought it was the greatest thing! She loved it. I had it sent to her so all I have is pictures of her with it with a huge smile on her face.

customer_reviews.title: and every one of them loved it! They love pushing their babies around and ...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: She is two years old and plays with the every day.

customer_reviews.title: Great little stroller.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy little stroller. My daughter is obsessed with it. Perfect size for all her dolls. The little basket in the back is nice for carrying accessories or another stuffed doll or animal.

customer_reviews.title: Cute!

customer_reviews.title: Little pink stroller
customer_reviews.text: The hit of the Christmas presents for a sweet grand daughter. Thank you!

customer_reviews.text: , great for my five year old who loves to play with babies and she can close it by herself without pinching her fingers or asking me for help

product_meta.title: Precious Toys Pink & White Polka Dots Foldable Doll Stroller With Hood
product_meta.description: Color:BasicThis "Precious Toys Doll Stroller" is with no doubt the best toy which can be given to our kids or as a gift. Our children will play for hours and use their imagination with this lovely "Doll Stroller". Not only for girls, but the boys will love it too with no exceptions! This "Precious Toys Doll Stroller" is constructed from high quality metal and fabric. It has a fold-able hood, seat belt, and basket in the bottom. It will also easily fold and unfold, so when is not in use, it will not take up space in your home. We chose the most loved colors on our customers, our children.
feature_bullets: Pink & white polka dots with silver frame and hot pink handles. Features a foldable hood, seat belt, and basket in the bottom.
Made of top quality and specially designed with double wheels on all 4 legs for extra stability.
Easy to unfold, and folds compact for easy storage. Comes fully assembled.
Lead free and tested for USA safety regulation.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars692 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
